ProductInfo.Features:
iSmart 24CH CCTV H.264 Security DVR System 1TB HDD
Plug & Play feature requires only ID and Password to set up.
Live view or Playback recorded video via Smartphones, Tablets, PC and Mac.
Motion detected, time shcheduled & continuous recording mode.
Hard disk hibernation technology, HDD faulty alarm & Raid (Redundancy)
24CH D1 Standalone DVR
Dual-core CPU presents the powerful preview, recording, playback and network performance
H.264 dual-stream video compression
HDMI / VGA / CVBS/(BNC) synchronous video output
All channel simultaneous realtime playback, smart search
Smart video detection: MD, camera blank, video loss
Alarm triggering screen tips, buzzer, PTZ, e-mail & FTP upload
Support 2 SATA HDDs , 2 USB2.0
Built-in web server, CMS(DSS/PSS) & DMSS
ProductInfo.Name: iSmart 24CH CCTV H.264 Security DVR HDMI Video Out 1TB HDD
